name: Keyless
description:
Keyless is game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020, which theme was 'Out of Control'

In Keyless, you have to carry your controls with you, and you are only allowed to hold a certain number of controls each level. You can discard your controls at will. The goal of each level is to grab the keycard to open the door, and get to the door, but you have to solve puzzles in order to do so.

Press Q to pick up Keys

Press R to restart a level

Press F11 for fullscreen

Press ESC to quit.

The KEY SLOTS on the hud represents how many free keys you have. Four empty squares means you have four spare keys that you can pick up without having to drop another
